meanings.definition: The part of the body between the chest and the pelvis.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his abdomen after eating too quickly.
meanings.sent2: She placed her hand on her abdomen to feel the baby kicking.
meanings.sent3: The ticklish kitten giggled when its abdomen was tickled.
meanings.sent4: Her abdomen was a bottomless pit, always hungry for more food.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's abdomen rippled with every graceful movement.
